price: 23. (Alle) lama weydiiyo wuxuu Falo, iyagase (dadka) waa la weydiin.
arabic: لَا يُسۡـَٔلُ عَمَّا يَفۡعَلُ وَهُمۡ يُسۡـَٔلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: lā yus'alu ʿammā yafʿalu wahum yus'alūna
